ygData.subject: Re: Anti-Camping ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Jeez! I am a lvl 13 wizard and I need a shoulder to cry on.  I have reached that stage where I have bcome bored and frustrated by EQ.  I can t find quality
ygData.messageBody:
Jeez!

I am a lvl 13 wizard and I need a shoulder to cry on. I have reached that
stage where I have bcome bored and frustrated by EQ. I can't find quality
poelpe to quest with, most that I have found before are way past me now in
level. I am so fucing sick of going to the same places and getting hardly
any expeirence, and spending half the time meditating. what do I do!!!???
Woe is me! how did you all get past this time? Is there anyplace I
sbould go to get good exp or items? I dont ave anything cool or any
latinum I am pathetic....|:( <snif>

-joe
